title: All Cars go to Heaven 1: Idea
description: This week we sit down and prepare for the an entirely off road trip through Washington state as planned by Thad.  We spend some time digging through Craigslist for beater trucks and discussing plans for the trip.  In addition we have both Matt and Zack's long term impressions of the Volt we discuss it's cousn the Cadillac ELR and Matt tells us about his time with the Mitsubish Evolution 311RS.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: This week we sit down and prepare for the an entirely off road trip through Washington state as planned by Thad.  We spend some time digging through Craigslist for beater trucks and discussing plans for the trip.  In addition we have both Matt and Zack's long term impressions of the Volt we discuss it's cousn the Cadillac ELR and Matt tells us about his time with the Mitsubish Evolution 311RS.
